SKT_FIRST.name: Code Khepri
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Reduces Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, then attacks the enemy.
Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to reduce Priority of the target by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
Increases damage dealt by this attack proportional to the caster's missing Health.
The caster cannot be defeated by Health reduced from using this skill.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr:
자신 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 감소시킨 후 적 대상을 공격합니다.
<color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 대상의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>-20%</color> 감소 시킵니다.
해당 공격은 자신이 잃은 체력 비례 피해량이 증가합니다.
이 스킬로 인한 체력 감소로는 시전자가 사망하지 않습니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp:
自分のHPを<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>DOWNさせた後、敵単体にダメージを与える。
<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で対象の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>-20%</color>DOWNさせる。
このスキルは自分の残りHPが低いほどダメージがUPする。
このスキルでスキル使用者が倒れることはない。

SKT_SECOND.name: Code Medjed
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
Reduces Health of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>, then attacks all enemies.
Reduces Priority of the target by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
Increases damage dealt by this attack proportional to the caster's missing Health.
The caster cannot be defeated by Health reduced from using this skill.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
자신 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 감소시킨 후 적 전체를 공격합니다.
대상의 행동 게이지를 <color=#28d9ed>-10%</color> 감소 시킵니다.
해당 공격은 자신이 잃은 체력 비례 피해량이 증가합니다.
이 스킬로 인한 체력 감소로는 시전자가 사망하지 않습니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
自分のHPを<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>DOWNさせた後、敵全体にダメージを与える。
対象の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>-10%</color>DOWNさせる。
このスキルは自分の残りHPが低いほど、ダメージがUPする。
このスキルでスキル使用者が倒れることはない。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Code Anubis
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies, and grants Immortality to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nAdditionally, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict Stunned on the enemy for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, or for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> when the enemy is granted Invulnerability.\nIncreases damage dealt by this attack proportional to the caster's missing Health.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고, 자신은 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 불사 상태가됩니다.\n또한, <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 무적 상태의 적은 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 그 외의 적은 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 스턴 상태로 만듭니다.\n해당 공격은 자신이 잃은 체력 비례 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、自分に<color=#28d9ed>不死</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。\nまた、無敵状態の敵に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率でスタンを<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与し、無敵状態でない敵にはスタンを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。\nこのスキルは自分の残りHPが低いほど、ダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, deals fixed damage equal to <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> of the target's Max Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the target by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상에게 대상 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>8%</color> 만큼의 고정 피해를 입힙니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>-20%</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、対象の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>8%</color>の固定ダメージを与える。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>-20%</color>DOWNさせる。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
